meta.name: Tom Andrieu
meta.title: Product Engineer
meta.description: Product Engineer. I build products end-to-end, talk to users, iterate fast, and help teams do their best work.

about.intro: I build products for <highlight>REAL USERS</highlight> and help small teams <highlight>MOVE FAST</highlight>.
about.detail: I talk to users, own problems end-to-end, and iterate until it works. I'd rather build something small that matters than plan something big that doesn't. Working with AI has made me even more optimistic about what focused teams can create.
